content:
This chunk details specific particle emitters including PointEmitter, RectangleEmitter, RingEmitter, SphereSurfaceEmitter, and SphereVolumeEmitter, describing their unique parameters and custom mode behavior.

PointEmitter

Variable Definition Values location Location of outer point (x, y, z)

Custom mode generates particles with no initial velocity.

RectangleEmitter

Variable Definition Values minBound 2D point defining the rectangle (x, z) maxBound 2D point defining the rectangle (x, z)

Custom mode generates particles with no initial velocity.

RingEmitter

Variable Definition Values radius Radius of disc [0, infinity) angle Particle launch angle [0, 360]

Custom mode uses the second parameter to emit particles at an angle with respect to the vector from the ring center to the spawn point. 0 degrees emits particles away from the center, and 180 degrees emits particles into the center.

SphereSurfaceEmitter

Variable Definition Values radius Radius of sphere [0, infinity)

Custom mode generates particles with no initial velocity.

SphereVolumeEmitter

Variable Definition Values radius Radius of sphere [0, infinity)
